title: Jordan Peterson & the Media, with Tim Lott
description:
Over the weekend the Sunday Times published the first full interview with Jordan Peterson since his recovery from debilitating illness, and retreat from the public eye over the last two years.

It was titled 'A Broken Man', and in the aftermath, Peterson described it as containing "sheer cruelty and spite" on the part of the journalist.

Two of the first journalists to cover the Peterson phenomenon back in 2017,  David Fuller and Tim Lott, discuss the background to the article, the journalistic ethics involved, Peterson's ongoing trial by media, and the valid questions that they would like to put to him.

This is an edit of a dialogue and live Q&A with Rebel Wisdom Sensemakers, to join these calls, consider becoming a member: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans

Link to Times article posted on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/JordanPeterson/comments/lanmbf/the_times_full_article_jordan_peterson_on_his/

Full audio of the interview posted by Jordan Peterson: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fd2wKn6-X_A&feature=youtu.be

Jordan's response: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/blog-posts/the-sunday-times-interview-request-and-my-response/
